page.title: 08LIFE-STYLES Recreation
page.content: The{Blackboys Inn}is a very old public house.It was built during the late 14th century.It is built of white washed brick and weatherboard that has been painted black. It has old cow dung and wattle walls and a very low ceiling with thick beams. The first customers were charcoal burners from the woods where charcoal was being burnt for iron smelting.They were covered in black,dusty charcoal and this is how the pub got its name. The Inn has a ghost called Ann Starr who died when she was 39 in 1804.Her father was the innkeeper. Now the Inn is a popular place for locals and holidaymakers.It is in a pretty country setting. It has a green at the front with large chestnut trees and at one side there is a duck pond. The Blackboys Cricket Club use the Inn for their headquarters.
